Package listeners

Class MLTrainingListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • bwapi.DefaultBWListener
      • listener.GameListener
        • listeners.MLTrainingListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bwapi.BWEventListener
    public class MLTrainingListener
extends GameListener
    This class is a skeleton of VikingBotListener that allows the ML model to train separately from the AI planning
